branchCategory.name: 90-MHS3, Air Gripper, 3 Finger, Parallel Style
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Gripper&nbsp;series 90-MHS3 utilizes a wedge cam design to minimize their size yet retains a high holding force.&nbsp;90-MHS3 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The small size of the units makes them well suited for end-of-arm or space constrained pick-and-place applications. The three-finger design of the 90-MHS3 makes it ideal for gripping round objects and loading or unloading items from the chuck of a machine tool.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
